name: Pacific Nightmare
description:
Carnage in a dream setting...

The day started out well for this man and his beloved dog. He was driving around in a luxury car on the heavenly Pacific coast when suddenly the brakes stopped working. Then began a frenzied race to do as little damage as possible.

You must try to dodge the most people you can while avoiding the obstacles. Horn bonuses can be picked up when driving to warn people up and maybe you will avoid the disaster...

If you are a fan of retro games, try enabling the 'SUPER RETRO MODE' by pressing the F1 key.

Theme :  From dream to nightmare

Contrainte LevelUp :  Retro, Story-driven

Team (Pêche et Tradition) : Luc Francey, Quentin Meyer, Baptiste Torche, Elio Ramel, David Dunand

Controls : A = left | D = right | space = honk | F = restart | F1 'SUPER RETRO MODE'

Music credits :  Airglow - Memory Bank | Neon Red Instrumental Remix - Miracle Of Sound
